sections.headline: Google Ads Services
sections.subheadline: Comprehensive Google Ads management tailored for local service businesses who need a steady stream of qualified leads.

services.name: Google Search Ads
services.description: Capture customers at the exact moment they're searching for your services. Search ads put you at the top of Google when prospects are ready to buy.

included: Frequency capping to avoid ad fatigue

corePages.title: Google Ads Case Studies & Results for Service Businesses
corePages.metaDescription: Real results from HVAC, plumbing, roofing, and other service businesses. See how we generated 3,587 leads with 6.8x average ROAS.

sections.headline: Real Results From Real Businesses
sections.subheadline: See how I've helped service-based businesses transform their lead generation with strategic Google Ads campaigns.

caseStudies.challenge: Seasonal business struggling to generate consistent leads year-round, especially during slower months.
caseStudies.solution: Implemented a comprehensive Google Search and Local Service Ads strategy with seasonal budget adjustments and targeted messaging for both heating and cooling services.
caseStudies.testimonial: Working with this specialist transformed our business. We went from feast or famine to having a consistent pipeline of qualified leads every single month.
caseStudies.author: Mike Stevens, Owner

caseStudies.challenge: High competition in local market with multiple established competitors outbidding on key search terms.
caseStudies.solution: Focused on long-tail keywords and service-specific campaigns while optimizing Quality Score to reduce CPC and improve ad position.
caseStudies.testimonial: I was skeptical about Google Ads at first, but the results speak for themselves. We're now booking out 2-3 weeks in advance.
caseStudies.author: Carlos Rodriguez, Operations Manager

caseStudies.challenge: Lead quality was poor with previous agency - getting tire-kickers instead of serious buyers ready to invest in roof replacement.
caseStudies.solution: Implemented strict negative keyword lists, created separate campaigns for emergency repairs vs. full replacements, and added qualification questions in ad copy.
caseStudies.testimonial: Finally, someone who understands that it's not about volume - it's about quality. Every lead we get now is pre-qualified and serious.
caseStudies.author: Jennifer Walsh, Owner

buildNotes.navigation: Consistent across all pages with active state highlighting
buildNotes.footer: 4-column layout with industries, services, company, contact
buildNotes.mobileOptimization: All pages must be mobile-responsive with tap-to-call buttons
buildNotes.ctaStrategy: Primary CTA (blue button) on every page above fold and at bottom
buildNotes.internalLinking: Cross-link between related pages, especially industry pages to services
buildNotes.imageOptimization: Use WebP format, lazy loading, alt tags with keywords
